mapper.sql: u.id as id , u.tid as tid , u.lazy_cat_status as lazyCatStatus , u.tender_full_time as tenderFullTime , u.lazy_status_change_time as lazyStatusChangeTime , u.account_number as accountNumber , u.account_type as accountType , u.premium_fee as premiumFee , u.premium_spouse_fee as premiumSpouseFee , u.premium_coborrower_fee as premiumCoborrowerFee , u.premium_coborrower_count as premiumCoborrowerCount , u.guarantee_agent_fee as guaranteeAgentFee , u.guarantee_fee as guaranteeFee , u.credit_reference_fee as creditReferenceFee , u.risk_margin_fee as riskMarginFee , u.premium_cplus_fee as premiumCplusFee , u.savings_cplus_fee as savingsCplusFee , u.avg_income as avgIncome , u.family_assets as familyAssets , u.loan_usage as loanUsage , u.rayment_source as raymentSource , u.is_stock as isStock , u.version as version , u.service_fee as serviceFee , u.offline_service_fee as offlineServiceFee , u.more_tender_diplay_info as moreTenderDiplayInfo , u.more_tender_type as moreTenderType , u.create_time as createTime , u.update_time as updateTime , u.loan_source as loanSource , u.once_repayment_sign as onceRepaymentSign , u.is_repay_old as isRepayOld , u.conversion_type as conversionType , u.remark as remark , u.agent_serilanumber as agentSerilanumber , u.agent_type as agentType , u.chargeoff_type as chargeoffType , u.principal_compress_rate as principalCompressRate , u.interest_rate_display as interestRateDisplay , u.irr_rate as irrRate , u.confirm_type as confirmType , u.confirm_check_time as confirmCheckTime , u.confirm_check_status as confirmCheckStatus , u.extra_service_fee as extraServiceFee , u.confirm_check_position as confirmCheckPosition , u.enterprise_verification_status as enterpriseVerificationStatus
mapper.select: select count(u.id) from d_tender_bus_detail u where 1=1
select count(u.id) from d_tender_bus_detail u where ${whereSqlStr}

select
from d_tender_bus_detail u where 1=1 and u.ID = #{id,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.insert: insert into d_tender_bus_detail( tid, lazy_cat_status, tender_full_time, lazy_status_change_time, account_number, account_type, premium_fee, premium_spouse_fee, premium_coborrower_fee, insert into d_tender_bus_detail( tid, lazy_cat_status, tender_full_time, lazy_status_change_time, account_number, account_type, premium_fee, premium_spouse_fee, premium_coborrower_fee, premium_coborrower_count, guarantee_agent_fee, guarantee_fee, credit_reference_fee, risk_margin_fee, premium_cplus_fee, savings_cplus_fee, avg_income, family_assets, loan_usage, rayment_source, is_stock, version, service_fee, offline_service_fee, more_tender_diplay_info, more_tender_type, create_time, update_time, loan_source, once_repayment_sign, is_repay_old, conversion_type, remark, agent_serilanumber, agent_type, chargeoff_type, principal_compress_rate, interest_rate_display, irr_rate, confirm_type, confirm_check_time, confirm_check_status, extra_service_fee, confirm_check_position, enterprise_verification_status )values
( #{obj.tid,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.lazyCatStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.tenderFullTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.lazyStatusChangeTime,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.accountNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.accountType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.premiumFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.premiumSpouseFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.premiumCoborrowerFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.premiumCoborrowerCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.guaranteeAgentFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.guaranteeFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.creditReferenceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.riskMarginFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.premiumCplusFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.savingsCplusFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.avgIncome,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.familyAssets,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.loanUsage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.raymentSource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.isStock,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.version,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.serviceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.offlineServiceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.moreTenderDiplayInfo,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.moreTenderType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.loanSource,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.onceRepaymentSign,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.isRepayOld,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.conversionType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.agentSerilanumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{obj.agentType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.chargeoffType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.principalCompressRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.interestRateDisplay,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.irrRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.confirmType,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.confirmCheckTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{obj.confirmCheckStatus,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.extraServiceFee,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{obj.confirmCheckPosition,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{obj.enterpriseVerificationStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
